headline: Constellation‘s Calpine Deal Clears Texas Regulatory Review
summary: BALTIMORE, June 05, 2025--Constellation announced it has received regulatory approval from the Public Utility Commission of Texas for its acquisition of Calpine Corporation.

headline: Meta’s Nuclear Deal Underscores the Looming Gap for AI’s Power Needs
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Meta Platforms Inc.’s flashy deal this week for nuclear power was just the latest sign of the technology industry’s need for more energy — and fast.
